{{Wired embedded system |brand=ZTE |model=ZXDSL 831 |revision=CII |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=08/19/2010 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=DareGlobal |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=dsl modem,CPE |fcc_id=Q78-ZXDSL831II |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=0.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=TrendChip |cpu1_model=TC3162U;TC3162U-LQ128G; |cpu1_cspeed=450 |fla1=2 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25Q16BVSIG |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-6G |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=TrendChip |sw_model=TC2205F |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=xDSL AFE;TrendChip;TC3086;TC3086, QFN64, EPG;1; ,,, 2A/18V Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP1482DS;;1; ,,, DC/DC Switching Regulator;ATC;AP34063;;1; |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL2 |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui_eth=FC:C8:97 }} {{TagLine|ADSL CPE}} :{{ProductPage|http://wwwen.zte.com.cn/en/products/access/cpe/}}
"PWB:T0047246A-PL" and "DATE:2010.08.19" is silkscreened on the board.
[[ZTE ZXDSL 831CII]] ([http://remont-aud.net/dump/planshety_i_ehl_knigi/zte/zte_zxdsl831cii_chassis_pcb_bzrd0_v1_0/467-1-0-12013 Chassis PCB] - BZRD0 V1.0) 08/19/2010 *CPU: [[TrendChip]] TC3162U -LQ128G (U100) *RAM: ''EtronTech'' EM638165TS-6G (8MB) *Flash: ''Winbond'' 25Q16BVSIG (2MB) *DSL AFE: [[TrendChip]] TC3086 -QFN64-EPG (U200) *Ethernet Switch: [[TrendChip]] TC2205F (U300) *PMU: ''MPS'' MP1482DS, ATC AP34063 (DC/DC)
